Sell Star(s) for Coins.code:
; NAME: Sell Star(s) for Coins
; GAMES: MP3_USA
; EXECUTION: Direct
; PARAM: Number|SellPrice
; PARAM: Boolean|SellMultiple
; PARAM: Space|SpaceToFace

; This code is designed to allow you to sell Stars to receive coins.
; The coins received per Star is set by the parameter "SellPrice".
; This event supports selling either one Star at a time or multiple
; at once; just set the parameter "SellMultiple" to "true" to allow
; for selling multiple Stars at once.

ADDIU SP SP -80
SW RA 76(SP)
SW S0 72(SP)
SW S1 68(SP)
SW S2 64(SP)
SW S3 60(SP)
SW S4 56(SP)
SW S5 52(SP)

; S0 = Current Player Struct
; S1 = Prompt Choice
; S2 = Coin Profit
; S3 = Stars to Sell
; S4 = Player's Stars
; S5 = SellPrice

;===Set Player Idle Animation===
LI A0 -1 ; Set current player
LI A1 -1 ; Set idle animation
JAL SetBoardPlayerAnimation
LI A2 2 ; Loop the animation

;===Rotate Toward Space===
LI A0 -1 ; Set current player
LI A1 8 ; Rotate over 8 frames
JAL 0x800ED20C ; Rotate Player Model
LI A2 SpaceToFace

;===Check for Stars===
JAL GetPlayerStruct
LI A0 -1 ; Get current player struct at V0
MOVE S0 V0 ; Copy V0 to S0

LBU S4 0x0E(S0) ; Load stars into S1 from offset of player struct
BEQZ S4 NoStars ; If S1 = 0, player has no stars
NOP

;===Prepare Coin String to Display in Message===
LI S5 SellPrice

LUI A0 hi(CoinString)
ADDIU A0 A0 lo(CoinString) ; Saves # of coins to CoinString
LUI A1 hi(percent_d)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(percent_d)
JAL sprintf ; Converts a number to a text string
MOVE A2 S5 ; Converts the number of coins to a string

;===Prepare Star String to Display in Message===
LUI A0 hi(StarString)
ADDIU A0 A0 lo(StarString) ; Location of converted string
LUI A1 hi(percent_d)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(percent_d)
JAL sprintf
LI A2 1 ; Convert # of stars for sale into string (default 1)

;===Check to Sell Multiple Stars===
LI S3 1 ; Default sell 1 star at a time
LI T0 1
BEQ T0 S4 SellSingleStar ; If S1 = 1, player can sell 1 star
NOP
LI T0 SellMultiple ; 0 = only sell single star
BEQZ T0 SellSingleStar
NOP

;===Sell Multiple Stars===
JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x256 ; Bob-omb voice

SW R0 16(SP) ; A4
SW R0 20(SP) ; A5
SW R0 24(SP) ; A6
LI A0 0xB ; Character image (-1 for none, 0xB for Red Bob-omb)
; Visit the following link to get the full list of Character Images:
; https://github.com/PartyPlanner64/PartyPlanner64/wiki/Displaying-Messages
; If you use a character image, check the bottom of the code
LUI A1 hi(SellMultiStarsMessage)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(SellMultiStarsMessage)
LUI A2 hi(StarString)
ADDIU A2 A2 lo(StarString) ; Load StarString into A2 (string #1)
LUI A3 hi(CoinString)
JAL 0x800EC92C  ; ShowMessage2
ADDIU A3 A3 lo(CoinString) ; Load CoinString into A3 (string #2)

JAL PlayerIsCPU
LBU A0 0x1D(S0) ; V0 = 1 if current player is CPU

BNEZ V0 exitloop
NOP

LoopReturn:
JAL DetectCStickInput ; V0 = 1 if Stick is Up, -1 if Down, ELSE 0
LBU A0 0x1D(S0)

BEQZ V0 Loop
NOP

LI T0 1
BEQ V0 T0 CheckMax
NOP ; else CheckMin
CheckMin:
BNE S3 T0 ContinueNormal ; S3 =/= 1
NOP
J ContinueRefresh
MOVE S3 S4 ; Copy Player's Stars to Stars to Sell

CheckMax:
BNE S3 S4 ContinueNormal ; Player's Stars =/= Stars to Sell
NOP
J ContinueRefresh
MOVE S3 T0 ; S3 = 1

ContinueNormal:
ADDU S3 S3 V0 ; Add 1 to Stars to Sell

ContinueRefresh:
LUI A0 hi(StarString)
ADDIU A0 A0 lo(StarString)
LUI A1 hi(percent_d)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(percent_d)
JAL sprintf
MOVE A2 S3 ; Move Stars to Sell into A2

MULT S3 S5 ; Multiply Stars to Sell by Sell Price
MFLO A2 ; Move result to A2

LUI A0 hi(CoinString)
ADDIU A0 A0 lo(CoinString) ; Saves # of coins to CoinString
LUI A1 hi(percent_d)
JAL sprintf ; Converts a number to a text string
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(percent_d)

JAL PlaySound
LI A0 582 ; Coin Sound

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 2 ; Sleep for 2 frames so choosing amount is easier

Loop:
JAL DetectABInput ; V0 = 1 if A press, 2 if B press, ELSE 0
LBU A0 0x1D(S0)

LI T0 1
BEQ V0 T0 exitloop
NOP
BEQZ V0 ContinueInLoop
NOP

JAL PlaySound
LI A0 4 ; Back Sound Index

JAL 0x800EC6C8
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP
J SayingNo
NOP

ContinueInLoop:
LI A0 2
LUI A1 hi(StarString)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(StarString) ; String value
JAL 0x8005B6BC
LI A2 0 ; Start with String #1

LI A0 2
LUI A1 hi(SellMultiStarsMessage)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(SellMultiStarsMessage)
LI A2 -1
JAL 0x8005B43C
LI A3 -1

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 3

J LoopReturn
NOP

exitloop:
JAL CloseMessage
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

JAL PlaySound
LI A0 583 ; Cash Register Sound

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 10 ; Sleep 10 frames

J SellStar
NOP

;===Display Prompt to Sell a Star===
SellSingleStar:
LUI A0 hi(SellStarPrompt)
ADDIU A0 A0 lo(SellStarPrompt)
LI A1 1 ; Display prompt
LUI A2 hi(CoinString)
JAL CallMessage
ADDIU A2 A2 lo(CoinString) ; Load CoinString into A2 (string #1)

; Get the selection, either from the player or CPU.
; If A0 is a pointer to AI data, AI logic is ran to pick for CPUs.
; If A0 is 0 or 1, the 0th or 1st option is chosen by CPUs.
; If A0 is 2, then the value of A1 is the CPUs option index choice.
JAL AILogic
LBU A0 0x1D(S0) ; Current player index from offset of player struct
LI A0 2
JAL GetBasicPromptSelection
MOVE A1 V0 ; A1 now has the AI's decision
MOVE S1 V0 ; S1 now has the chosen option index

; Obligatory message box closing/cleanup calls.
JAL 0x800EC6C8
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

; Change the player's destination based on the choice.
LI T0 0
BEQ S1 T0 SellStar
NOP
LI T0 1
BEQ S1 T0 SayNo
NOP
JAL ViewBoardMap
NOP
J SellSingleStar
NOP

;===Sell Star(s)===
SellStar:
LBU T0 0x0E(S0) ; Load stars into T0 from offset of player struct
SUBU T0 T0 S3 ; T0 minus S3
SB T0 0x0E(S0) ; Store new star value into offset of player struct

;===Gain Coins===
MULT S3 S5 ; Multiply stars sold by price per star
MFLO S2 ; Store result in S2
SLTI T0 S2 1000 ; T0 = 1 if S2 < 1000
BNEZ T0 GainCoins
NOP ; else S2 = 1000+
LI S2 999

GainCoins:
LBU A0 0x1D(S0) ; Give coins to current player
JAL AdjustPlayerCoinsGradual
MOVE A1 S2 ; Give coins

LBU A0 0x1D(S0) ; Give coins to current player
JAL ShowPlayerCoinChange
MOVE A1 S2 ; Give coins

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 30 ; Wait 30 frames for coin change

;===Play Happy Voice===
LBU T0 3(S0) ; ; Load character value from offset of player struct
JAL PlaySound
ADDIU A0 T0 0x2BE ; Add character value to Mario's sad voice
; Character voices are their "character value" distance away from
; Mario's, e.g. Luigi's character value = 1, so Luigi's happy voice
; is 1 away from Mario's.
; 0x2BE = Happy Voice, 0x287 = Sad Voice

; Visit the following link to get SFX Indexes:
; https://pastebin.com/H1jxNFqr

;===Play Happy Animation===
LI A0 -1 ; Set current player
LI A1 5 ; Joy animation
JAL SetBoardPlayerAnimation
LI A2 0 ; Do not loop animation

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 40 ; Wait 40 frames for animation

;===Sold Message===
LUI A0 hi(SoldMessage)
ADDIU A0 A0 lo(SoldMessage)
LI A1 0 ; Display message
JAL CallMessage
LI A2 0 ; No string

J exit
NOP

;===Prepare Say No Message===
SayingNo:
LUI A0 hi(CoinString)
ADDIU A0 A0 lo(CoinString) ; Saves # of coins to CoinString
LUI A1 hi(percent_d)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(percent_d)
JAL sprintf ; Converts a number to a text string
MOVE A2 S5 ; Converts the number of coins to a string

;===Say No Message===
SayNo:
LUI A0 hi(DeclineMessage)
ADDIU A0 A0 lo(DeclineMessage)
LI A1 0 ; Display message
LUI A2 hi(CoinString)
JAL CallMessage
ADDIU A2 A2 lo(CoinString) ; Load CoinString into A2 (string #1)

J exit
NOP

;===No Stars Message===
NoStars:
LUI A0 hi(NoStarsMessage)
ADDIU A0 A0 lo(NoStarsMessage)
LI A1 0 ; Display message
JAL CallMessage
LI A2 0 ; No string

exit:
LW RA 76(SP)
LW S0 72(SP)
LW S1 68(SP)
LW S2 64(SP)
LW S3 60(SP)
LW S4 56(SP)
LW S5 52(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 80

;===Prep for Displaying Strings===
.align 16
percent_d:
.asciiz "%d" ; 0x25640000

.align 16
CoinString:
.fill 8

.align 16
StarString:
.fill 8

;===Mini Func to Call Static Message===
.align 4
CallMessage:
ADDIU SP SP -48
SW RA 44(SP)
SW S0 40(SP)
SW S1 36(SP)
SW S2 32(SP)

; A0 = Message Address
; A1 = Message or Prompt (0 or 1)
; A2 = String #1 (byte 0x11)

MOVE S1 A1 ; Copy A1 to S1
MOVE S0 A0 ; Copy A0 to S0
MOVE S2 A2 ; Copy A2 to S2

JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x256 ; Bob-omb voice

SW R0 16(SP) ; A4
SW R0 20(SP) ; A5
SW R0 24(SP) ; A6
LI A0 0xB ; Character image (-1 for none, 0xB for Red Bob-omb)
; Visit the following link to get the full list of Character Images:
; https://github.com/PartyPlanner64/PartyPlanner64/wiki/Displaying-Messages
; If you use a character image, check the bottom of the code
MOVE A1 S0 ; Copy S0 to A0
MOVE A2 S2 ; Copy S2 to A2
JAL ShowMessage
LI A3 0

BNEZ S1 CallMessageExit ; If S0 = 1, exit to close prompt
NOP

; Obligatory message box closing/cleanup calls.
JAL 0x800EC9DC
NOP
JAL CloseMessage
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

CallMessageExit:
LW RA 44(SP)
LW S0 40(SP)
LW S1 36(SP)
LW S2 32(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 48

;===Mini Func to Decide AI Choice for Prompt===
.align 4
AILogic:
ADDIU SP SP -32
SW RA 28(SP)

; A0 = Current Player Index

JAL GetPlayerPlacement ; Returns 0-3 for 1st to 4th
NOP
LI T0 20 ; Chances in increments of 20
MULT T0 V0 ; Multiply V0 by T0
MFLO T0 ; Move result from LO to T0 (0,20,40,60)
JAL RNGPercentChance ; A0 % chance of V0 = 1
ADDIU A0 T0 20 ; Add base 20% chance

LW RA 28(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 32

.byte 0x0A ; New line (writes below)
.byte 0x1A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A ; Padding for character image
.ascii "Come back when you"
.byte 0x5C ; Apostrophe (')
.ascii "ve collected some"
.byte 0xC2 ; Exclamation mark (!)
.byte 0xFF,0 ; Wait, press A to confirm

; Here's a list of the most common bytes you'll need
; .byte 0x01 ; Black font
; .byte 0x03 ; Red font
; .byte 0x04 ; Purple font
; .byte 0x05 ; Green font
; .byte 0x06 ; Blue font
; .byte 0x07 ; Yellow font
; .byte 0x08 ; White font
; .byte 0x85 ; Period (.)
; .byte 0xC2 ; Exclamation mark (!)
; .byte 0xC3 ; Question mark (?)
; .byte 0x82 ; Comma (,)
; .byte 0x0A ; New line (writes below)
; .byte 0x5C ; Apostrophe (')
; .byte 0x29 ; Coin icon
; .byte 0x3D ; - (minus)
; .byte 0x3E ; x (multiply)
; .byte 0xFF,0 ; Wait, press A to confirm

; If your message has an image, use this at the start of each line
; .byte 0x1A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A ; Padding for character image

;===Funcs to Read Controller Inputs===
.align 4
DetectCStickInput:
ADDIU SP SP -40
SW RA 36(SP)
SW S5 32(SP)

; A0 Current Player index

LUI T1 hi(p1_controller)
ADDIU T1 T1 lo(p1_controller) ; Load P1's Controller
LI T0 0x38 ; This is the distance between each player's Controller
MULT A0 T0 ;  Multiply Current Player Index by S3
MFLO T0 ; Move the result to S3

ADDU T1 T1 T0 ; Add result to get Current Player's Controller Addr
LBU T0 0(T1) ; Load address value into A1

LUI T1 hi(0x800CC3F7)
ADDIU T1 T1 lo(0x800CC3F7) ; Load P1's Y Axis
LI A2 0x8 ; This is the distance between each player's Controller
MULT A2 T0 ;  Multiply Controller value by 8
MFLO T0 ; Move the result to S3

ADDU T1 T1 T0 ; Add result to get Current Player's Y Axis
LBU T0 0(T1) ; Load address value into A1

SLTI S5 T0 0x1E ; S5 = 1 if less than 1E
BNE S5 R0 return_zero 
NOP
SLTI S5 T0 0x7C ; Set if Stick is tilted up
BNE S5 R0 return_one
NOP
SLTI S5 T0 0xE2
BNE S5 R0 return_neg_one
NOP

return_zero:
J DetectCStickInputexit
LI V0 0

return_one:
J DetectCStickInputexit
LI V0 1

return_neg_one:
LI V0 -1

DetectCStickInputexit:
LW RA 36(SP)
LW S5 32(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 40

.align 4
DetectABInput:
ADDIU SP SP -40
SW RA 36(SP)

; A0 Current Player's Control Stick Y axis

LUI T1 hi(p1_controller)
ADDIU T1 T1 lo(p1_controller) ; Load P1's Controller
LI T0 0x38 ; This is the distance between each player's Controller
MULT A0 T0 ;  Multiply Current Player Index by S3
MFLO T0 ; Move the result to S3

ADDU T1 T1 T0 ; Add result to get Current Player's Controller Addr
LBU T0 0(T1) ; Load address value into A1

LUI T1 hi(0x800CC3F4)
ADDIU T1 T1 lo(0x800CC3F4) ; Load P1's Button Press Address
LI A2 0x2 ; This is the distance between each player's Button Address
MULT A2 T0 ;  Multiply Controller value by 2
MFLO T0 ; Move the result to S3

ADDU T1 T1 T0 ; Add result to get Current Player's Y Axis
LBU T0 0(T1) ; Load address value into A1

LI T1 0x80
BEQ T0 T1 APress
NOP
LI T1 0x40
BEQ T0 T1 BPress
NOP

NoPress:
J DetectABInputexit
LI V0 0

APress:
J DetectABInputexit
LI V0 1

BPress:
LI V0 2

DetectABInputexit:
LW RA 36(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 40

Paid Fly Guy Flight Service.code:
; NAME: Paid Fly Guy Flight Service
; GAMES: MP3_USA
; EXECUTION: Direct
; PARAM: Space|Destination
; PARAM: Space|PreviousSpace
; PARAM: Space|NextSpace
; PARAM: Space|SpaceDirection
; PARAM: Boolean|EverdriveCompatibility
; PARAM: +Number|Price

ADDIU SP SP -80
SW RA 76(SP)
SW S2 72(SP) ;Holds choice for window
SW S1 68(SP) ;Has current player
SW S0 64(SP) ;Holds various values

;===============================================================
;Code by Spongyoshi made originally for FixedFun
;Call unto your space the opponent of your choice
;Choose yourself to cancel it, Choose Your Choice for a random one
;Edited from Airsola's Amazing Assembly!!
;Feel free to use for your own boards!!
;Destination should be the current space
;PreviousSpace should be the space before the current space
;NextSpace should be the space after the current space
;SpaceDirection should be where the player looks at during the event
;Price is the Price to pay for this service
;===============================================================

;===Set Player Idle Animation===
LI A0 -1 ; Load Current Player Index
LI A1 -1 ; Set player's idle animation
JAL SetBoardPlayerAnimation
LI A2 2 ; Loop the animation

;===Rotate Player Model Towards Space===
LI A0 -1 ; Load Current Player Index
LI A1 10 ; Frames it takes to turn
JAL 0x800ED20C ; RotatePlayerModel function
LI A2 SpaceDirection ; Space Index to face towards

JAL PlaySound 
LI A0 0x2A5 ; Shy Guy Voice Index

;BEING CHECKING PLAYER FOR NECESSARY COINS============================
JAL GetCurrentPlayerIndex
NOP
MOVE S1 V0 ; Copied Current Player Index to S1
MOVE A0 S1 ; Copied Current Player Index to A0
JAL PlayerHasCoins ; Checks if Player has A1's amount of Coins
LI A1 Price ; Amount of coins to check for
BEQ V0 R0 NotEnoughCoins ; If insufficient funds, branch
NOP
;END CHECKING PLAYER FOR NECESSARY COINS==============================

;BEGIN LOADING STRING VALUES FOR PROMPT===============================
LUI A0 hi(coin_string_loc)
ADDIU A0 A0 lo(coin_string_loc) ; Parse Destination
LUI A1 hi(percent_d)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(percent_d) ; String Format
JAL sprintf
LI A2 Price ; Convert Price into string
;END LOADING STRING VALUES FOR PROMPT=================================
Reload:
SW R0 16(SP) ; A4
SW R0 20(SP) ; A5
SW R0 24(SP) ; A6
LI A0 0xA ; Character image (Game Guy)
LUI A1 hi(First_Prompt)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(First_Prompt)
LI A2 0
LUI A3 hi(coin_string_loc)
ADDIU A3 A3 lo(coin_string_loc) ; Pass Price to A3
JAL 0x800EC8EC ; ShowMessage
NOP

; Get the selection, either from the player or CPU.
; If A0 is a pointer to AI data, AI logic is ran to pick for CPUs.
; If A0 is 0 or 1, the 0th or 1st option is chosen by CPUs.
; If A0 is 2, then the value of A1 is the CPUs option index choice.
J AILogic
NOP
AISelect:
LI A0 2
JAL GetBasicPromptSelection
MOVE A1 S3 ; A1 now has the AI's decision
MOVE S0 V0 ; S0 now has the chosen option index

; Obligatory message box closing/cleanup calls.
JAL 0x800EC6C8
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

; Change the outcome based on the choice.
LI A0 0
BEQ S0 A0 yes
NOP
LI A0 1
BEQ S0 A0 Declined
NOP
LI A0 2
BEQ S0 A0 viewmap
NOP

;WINDOW START
ComeBack:
JAL GetPlayerCharacterString ; V0 for P1's Character String
NOP

SW V1 16(SP) ; A4
SW T2 20(SP) ; A5
SW T0 24(SP) ; A6
LI A0 0xA ; Character image (Game Guy)
LUI A1 hi(Main_Prompt)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(Main_Prompt)
MOVE A2 V0
JAL ShowMessage
LI A3 0
; Get the selection, either from the player or CPU.
; If A0 is a pointer to AI data, AI logic is ran to pick for CPUs.
; If A0 is 0 or 1, the 0th or 1st option is chosen by CPUs.
; If A0 is 2, then the value of A1 is the CPUs option index choice.
LI A0 0
JAL GetBasicPromptSelection
LI A1 0
MOVE S0 V0 ; S0 now has the chosen option index

; Obligatory message box closing/cleanup calls.
JAL CloseMessage
NOP
jal   0x800EC9DC
       NOP
jal   0x800EC6EC
       NOP

; Change the outcome based on the choice.
BEQ S0 R0 Player1Select
NOP
LI T0 1
BEQ S0 T0 Player2Select
NOP
LI T0 2
BEQ S0 T0 Player3Select
NOP
LI T0 3
BEQ S0 T0 Player4Select
NOP
LI T0 4
BEQ S0 T0 PlayerRandomSelect
NOP
J view_map
NOP
;WINDOW END

view_map:
JAL ViewBoardMap
NOP
J ComeBack
NOP

viewmap:
JAL ViewBoardMap
NOP
J Reload
NOP

;YES RESULTS START
yes:
LI S0 Price

MOVE A0 S1 ; Current Player's Index moved to A0
JAL AdjustPlayerCoinsGradual ; Changes Player's coin amount
SUBU A1 R0 S0 ; Amount to pay

MOVE A0 S1 ; Current Player's Index moved to A0
JAL ShowPlayerCoinChange ; Displays Player's coin loss on-screen 
SUBU A1 R0 S0 ; Amount to display

JAL SleepProcess ; Sleeps for 30 frames
ADDIU A0 R0 30

J ComeBack
NOP
;YES RESULTS END

;DECLINED WINDOW START
Declined:
SW R0 16(SP) ; A4
SW R0 20(SP) ; A5
SW R0 24(SP) ; A6
LI A0 0xA ; Character image (Game Guy)
LUI A1 hi(Refusal_Message)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(Refusal_Message)
LI A2 0
JAL ShowMessage
LI A3 0
JAL 0x800EC9DC
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6C8
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

J exit
NOP
;DECLINED WINDOW END

;JOKE WINDOW START
JokeWindow:
SW R0 16(SP) ; A4
SW R0 20(SP) ; A5
SW R0 24(SP) ; A6
LI A0 0xA ; Character image (Game Guy)
LUI A1 hi(Joke_Message)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(Joke_Message)
LI A2 0
JAL ShowMessage
LI A3 0
JAL 0x800EC9DC
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6C8
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

J exit
NOP
;JOKE WINDOW END

;PLAYER RANDOM SELECT START;
PlayerRandomSelect:
JAL GetRandomByte ; Random Int at V0
NOP

SLTI S0 V0 90 ; Is the number less than 90?
BNE S0 R0 Player1Test
NOP

SLTI S0 V0 180 ; Is the number less than 180?
BNE S0 R0 Player2Test
NOP

J Player3Test
NOP
;PLAYER RANDOM SELECT END;

;PLAYER TEST SELECT START;
Player1Test:
LI S2 0 ;give P1 index
BEQ S2 S1 Player4Select ;if P1 index = current player, pick P4's
NOP
J Player1Select ;if not, select P1
NOP

Player2Test:
LI S2 1 ;give P2 index
BEQ S2 S1 Player4Select ;if P2 index = current player, pick P4's
NOP
J Player2Select ;if not, select P2
NOP

Player3Test:
LI S2 2 ;give P3 index
BEQ S2 S1 Player4Select ;if P3 index = current player, pick P4's
NOP
J Player3Select ;if not, select P3
NOP
;PLAYER TEST SELECT END;

;CHARACTER SELECT START;
Player1Select:
LI S2 0 ;give P1 index
BEQ S2 S1 JokeWindow ;if P1 index = current player, cancel
NOP
J WarpStart ;if not, start warp!
NOP
Player2Select:
LI S2 1 ;give P2 index
BEQ S2 S1 JokeWindow ;if P2 index = current player, cancel
NOP
J WarpStart ;if not, start warp!
NOP
Player3Select:
LI S2 2 ;give P3 index
BEQ S2 S1 JokeWindow ;if P3 index = current player, cancel
NOP
J WarpStart ;if not, start warp!
NOP
Player4Select:
LI S2 3 ;give P4 index
BEQ S2 S1 JokeWindow ;if P4 index = current player, cancel
NOP ;if not, start warp!
;CHARACTER SELECT END;

;WARP START
WarpStart:
LI A0 2 ; Star Fade-out 
JAL InitFadeOut
LI A1 10 ; Fade Out for 10 Frames

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 10 ; Sleep 10 Frames

MOVE A0 S2 ; Assigns Player Index to A0
LI A1 Destination_chain_index ; Assigns Chain Index to A1
JAL SetPlayerOntoChain
LI A2 Destination_chain_space_index ; Assigns Space Index to A2

MOVE A0 S2 ; Assigns Player Index to A0
LI A1 PreviousSpace_chain_index ; Assigns Chain Index to A1
JAL SetPrevChainAndSpace
LI A2 PreviousSpace_chain_space_index ; Assigns Space Index to A2

MOVE A0 S2 ; Assigns Player Index to A0
LI A1 NextSpace_chain_index ; Assigns Chain Index to A1
JAL SetNextChainAndSpace
LI A2 NextSpace_chain_space_index ; Assigns Space Index to A2

JAL GetPlayerStruct ; Player Struct at V0
MOVE A0 S2 ; Selected Player
MOVE S0 V0

LI A0 Destination_chain_index
JAL GetAbsSpaceIndexFromChainSpaceIndex ; Gets True Space Index at V0
LI A1 Destination_chain_space_index

LI S1 EverdriveCompatibility
BNE S1 R0 EverdriveSkip ; if yes, skip
NOP ; If not, keep going

JAL GetSpaceData ; Pointer to Space Data at V0
MOVE A0 V0 ; True Space Index

ADDIU V0 V0 8 ; This gets the X pos of the space
LW V1 0(V0) 
MOVE T0 V1 ; Copy to T0

ADDIU V0 V0 8 ; This gets the Y pos of the space
LW V1 0(V0)
MOVE T1 V1 ; Copy to T1

LI T2 0x41200000 ; Float value for 10?
MTC1 T2 F0 ; Move Float to F1?
MTC1 T1 F1 ; Move Space Y Pos float to F1?
ADD.S F0 F0 F1 ; Add the floats for maximum floatiness
MFC1 T1 F0 ; Move total to T1?

LW V1 0x24(S0) ; Load Offset 24 into V1
ADDIU V1 V1 0xC ; Add 0xC to get current player's X Coords
SW T0 0(V1) 

ADDIU V1 V1 8 ; This should load current player's Y Coords
SW T1 0(V1)
;WARP END

;EFFECTS START;
EverdriveSkip:
JAL PlaySound 
LI A0 0x1FD ; Flight Sound Index

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 40 ; Sleep 40 Frames

LI A0 2 ; Star Fade-in 
JAL InitFadeIn
LI A1 10 ; Fade In for 10 Frames
;EFFECTS END;

;FINAL WINDOW START
SW R0 16(SP) ; A4
SW R0 20(SP) ; A5
SW R0 24(SP) ; A6
LI A0 0xA ; Character image (Game Guy)
LUI A1 hi(Warp_Message)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(Warp_Message)
LI A2 0
JAL ShowMessage
LI A3 0
JAL 0x800EC9DC
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6C8
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP
J exit
NOP
;FINAL WINDOW END

;FINAL WINDOW START
NotEnoughCoins:
SW R0 16(SP) ; A4
SW R0 20(SP) ; A5
SW R0 24(SP) ; A6
LI A0 0xA ; Character image (Game Guy)
LUI A1 hi(No_Message)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(No_Message)
LI A2 0
JAL ShowMessage
LI A3 0
JAL 0x800EC9DC
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6C8
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP
;FINAL WINDOW END

JR RA

Hootenanny + (EX) [Airsola™].code:
; NAME: Hootenanny + (EX) [Airsola™]
; GAMES: MP3_USA
; EXECUTION: Direct
; PARAM: Number|WhichHootenanny
; PARAM: +Number|Price1
; PARAM: +Number|Price2
; PARAM: Space|BeforeHootenanny
; PARAM: Space|AfterHootenanny
; PARAM: Space|BeforeHootenanny2x

;====================================================================
; IMPORTANT: This code is designed to replicate the Hootenanny event 
;            from Mario Party 2... and more!
;
;			 If the WhichHootenanny parameter is set to 0 it's 
;            going to offer the Vanilla Hootenanny, if it's 1, it's 
;            the EX version, which also poisons the other players and 
;            extends your roll by 3, and if it's set to 2, the player
;            will be able to select between both Vanilla and EX.
;			 
;			 If you're only allowing the use of 1 of the Hootenannys,
;			 then Price1 is the parameter for how much it would cost.
;			 
;            If you're allowing the player to select between both of
;            them, then Price1 is the price of Vanilla, and Price2 is 
;            the price of EX. (PRICE2 SHOULD NEVER BE LOWER!!!)
;            
;            BeforeHootenanny is the Space before the event's location.
;            AfterHootenanny is the Space after the event's location.
;			 BeforeHootenanny2x is the Space before BeforeHootenanny.
;
;            This event is made as a passing event, and is not
;            expected to work as a landing event. 
;			 
;			 At the bottom of the code you will find useful links and
;			 explanations for some technical things in the code.
;====================================================================

ADDIU SP SP -120
SW RA 116(SP)
SW S0 112(SP) ; Option chosen / Loop Counter
SW S1 108(SP) ; Float holder for position changes
SW S2 104(SP) ; Unused
SW S3 100(SP) ; Unused
SW S4 96(SP) ; Current Player Struct
SW S5 92(SP) ; Destination Array
SW S6 88(SP) ; Price
SW S7 84(SP) ; Hootenanny Index (0 for Vanilla, 1 for EX)



JAL RefreshOptionArray ; Resets the Array colors 
NOP

LI A0 -1 ; Current Player
LI A1 -1 ; Idle Animation
JAL SetBoardPlayerAnimation 
LI A3 2 ; Loop

JAL GetPlayerStruct ; Struct at V0
LI A0 -1 ; Current Player
MOVE S4 V0 ; Copy Struct to S4

LBU A0 29(S4) ; Current Player's Index
JAL PlayerHasCoins ; V0 = 1 if they have enough, 0 if not 
LI A1 Price1 ; Cost for the event

BNEZ V0 determineprompt ; If they have the coins necessary, continue
NOP

JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x25A ; Koopa cry (Sad?)

LUI A1 hi(NotEnoughCoins_Message)
JAL ShowMessage_Function
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(NotEnoughCoins_Message)

J exit
NOP 

determineprompt:
LI T1 2 ; Index for Prompt using both Hootenannys
LI T0 WhichHootenanny 
BEQ T0 T1 doublehootenannyprompt ; Branch if it's both in 1 prompt
NOP

MOVE S7 T0 ; Move Hootenanny index to S7

JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x259 ; Koopa cry (Happy?)

LUI A0 hi(Price1_Pointer)
ADDIU A0 A0 lo(Price1_Pointer) ; Parse Destination
LUI A1 hi(percent_d)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(percent_d) ; String Format
JAL sprintf
LI A2 Price1 ; Convert Price into string

LBU A2 3(S4) ; Current Player Character Index
LUI A3 hi(Price1_Pointer)
ADDIU A3 A3 lo(Price1_Pointer)

SW R0 16(SP) ; A4
SW R0 20(SP) ; A5
SW R0 24(SP) ; A6
LI A0 1 ; Character image (Red Koopa)
LUI A1 hi(Hootenanny_Prompt)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(Hootenanny_Prompt)
ADDIU A2 A2 0x1C00 ; Add to get Character Name
JAL ShowMessage
NOP

JAL RNGPercentChance ; 0 or 1 at V0
LI A0 50 ; 50% Chance Yes/No

LI A0 2 ; Pick whatever is in A1 as AI's Choice
JAL GetBasicPromptSelection
MOVE A1 V0 ; Say Yes or No
MOVE S0 V0 ; Chosen Option Index

JAL 0x800EC9DC
NOP
JAL CloseMessage ; 3 Functions to close the message properly
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

LI T0 1 ; Second option index
BEQ S0 T0 declined
NOP
LI T0 2 ; Third option index
BEQ S0 T0 viewmap
NOP

LI S6 Price1
doublehootenannyjump:
LBU A0 29(S4) ; Current Player's Index
JAL AdjustPlayerCoinsGradual
SUBU A1 R0 S6

LBU A0 29(S4) ; Current Player's Index
JAL ShowPlayerCoinChange
SUBU A1 R0 S6

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 30 ; Frames

LUI A1 hi(CallingEveryone_Message)
JAL ShowMessage_Function
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(CallingEveryone_Message)

LI A0 1 ; Circle Fade
JAL InitFade
LI A1 0 ; Fade type (Out)

LUI S5 hi(DestinationSpaces_Array)
ADDIU S5 S5 lo(DestinationSpaces_Array)

JAL GetChainAndSpaceIndexFromAbsSpaceIndex ; Chain Index on V0, Chain Space Index on V1
LI A0 BeforeHootenanny
SB V0 0(S5) ; Store Destination Chain Index
SB V1 1(S5) ; Store Destination Chain Space Index

JAL GetChainAndSpaceIndexFromAbsSpaceIndex ; Chain Index on V0, Chain Space Index on V1
LI A0 AfterHootenanny
SB V0 2(S5) ; Store NextSpace Chain Index
SB V1 3(S5) ; Store NextSpace Chain Space Index

JAL GetChainAndSpaceIndexFromAbsSpaceIndex ; Chain Index on V0, Chain Space Index on V1
LI A0 BeforeHootenanny2x
SB V0 4(S5) ; Store PreviousSpace Chain Index
SB V1 5(S5) ; Store PreviousSpace Chain Space Index

LI S0 3 ; Start with Player 4
LI S1 0xC1200000 ; -10 (Float) for X pos
hootenannyloop:
BLTZ S0 hootenannyloop_exit
NOP
LBU T0 29(S4) ; Current Player's Index
BEQL S0 T0 hootenannyloop ; Loop if this is the turn player
ADDIU S0 S0 -1 ; Subtract 1 to get next player

MOVE A0 S0 ; Player Index
MOVE A1 S5 ; Space Array Pointer
JAL SetPlayerOntoChainVisually
MOVE A2 S1 ; Float for X pos

LI T0 0x41200000 ; 10 (Float) 
MTC1 S1 F0 ; X pos adjustment to F0
MTC1 T0 F1 ; 5 to F1
ADD.S F0 F0 F1 ; Add 5 to scoot next player to the right
MFC1 S1 F0 ; Return float to S1

BEQL S7 R0 hootenannyloop
ADDIU S0 S0 -1 ; Subtract 1 to get next player

JAL GetPlayerStruct ; Struct at V0
MOVE A0 S0 ; Player Index

LUI T3 hi(0x800CD0AF)
ADDIU T3 T3 lo(0x800CD0AF) ; Cursed Dice Flag Address
LBU T4 0(T3) ; Flag Value
MOVE T2 S0 ; This player's Index
LI T5 1 
SLLV T6 T5 T2 ; Shift left by player's index
AND T1 T4 T6 ; Compare Flag Value to Player Index
; V0 returns 0 if not Curse is not active, 1 if it is.
BNEZL T1 hootenannyloop
ADDIU S0 S0 -1 ; Subtract 1 to get next player

LI T5 1
SLLV T5 T5 T2 ; Shift by the player's index
ADDU T4 T4 T5 ; Add to current flag value
SB T4 0(T3)

LI T0 2 ; Poison Mushroom png 
LBU T1 23(V0) ; This player's Status Flags
ADDU T1 T0 T1 ; Add Poison Mushroom png
SB T1 23(V0) ; This player's Status Flags

J hootenannyloop
ADDIU S0 S0 -1 ; Subtract 1 to get next player

hootenannyloop_exit:
LI A0 1 ; Circle Fade
JAL InitFade
LI A1 1 ; Fade type (In)

JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x259 ; Koopa cry (Happy?)

LUI A1 hi(EveryoneReady_Message)
JAL ShowMessage_Function
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(EveryoneReady_Message)

JAL PlayMusic
LI A0 0x4A ; Sound Config

LI A0 -1 ; Current Player
LI A1 6 ; Star Get Animation
JAL SetBoardPlayerAnimation
LI A2 2 ; Loop

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 90 ; Frames

LI A0 1 ; Circle Fadeout
JAL InitFade
LI A1 0 ; Fade Type (Out)

BEQZ S7 skipthegoodstuff ; If it's a regular Hootenanny, skip to the end
NOP

LUI T0 hi(cur_player_spaces_remaining)
ADDIU T0 T0 lo(cur_player_spaces_remaining) ; Address on T0
LW T1 0(T0) 
ADDIU T1 T1 3 ; Add 3 to player's remaining roll
SW T1 0(T0)

LUI T3 hi(0x800CDBD2)
ADDIU T3 T3 lo(0x800CDBD2) ; P1 Forced Roll Address

LI T2 0x4C ; Distance between each player's addresses
LBU T4 29(S4) ; Player Index
MULT T4 T2 ; Multiply Current Player Index by T2
MFLO T2 ; Move Result to T2
ADDU T3 T3 T2 ; Add to get current Player's Forced Roll address
SB T1 3(T3) ; Store new remaining roll

LI S0 3 ; Start with Player 3
soundloop:
BLTZ S0 soundloop_exit
NOP
LBU T0 29(S4) ; Current Player Index
BEQL S0 T0 soundloop
ADDIU S0 S0 -1 ; Subtract 1 to get next player

JAL GetPlayerStruct ; Struct at V0
MOVE A0 S0 ; Player Index

LBU T0 3(V0) ; Character Index
JAL PlaySound
ADDIU A0 T0 0x287 ; Mario's Sad Voice Index + Current Character Index

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 20 ; Frames

J soundloop
ADDIU S0 S0 -1 ; Subtract 1 to get next player

skipthegoodstuff:
LI A0 -1 ; Current Player
LI A1 4 ; Dizzy Animation
JAL SetBoardPlayerAnimation
LI A2 2 ; Loop

LBU T0 3(S4) ; Current Player Character Index
JAL PlaySound
ADDIU A0 T0 0x287 ; Mario's Sad Voice Index + Current Character Index

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 30 ; Frames
soundloop_exit:
LI A0 1 ; Circle Fadeout
JAL InitFade
LI A1 1 ; Fade Type (In)

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 30 ; Frames

JAL GetBoardAudioIndex ; at V0
NOP

JAL PlayMusic ; Return music to normal
MOVE A0 V0 

J exit
NOP


declined:

NOP

viewmap:

NOP

NOP


doublehootenannyprompt:
JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x259 ; Koopa cry (Happy?)

LUI A0 hi(Price1_Pointer)
ADDIU A0 A0 lo(Price1_Pointer) ; Parse Destination
LUI A1 hi(percent_d)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(percent_d) ; String Format
JAL sprintf
LI A2 Price1 ; Convert Price into string

LUI A0 hi(Price2_Pointer)
ADDIU A0 A0 lo(Price2_Pointer) ; Parse Destination
LUI A1 hi(percent_d)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(percent_d) ; String Format
JAL sprintf
LI A2 Price2 ; Convert Price into string

JAL GetColorFormatter ; Color index at V0 (EX)
NOP 

LUI A0 hi(Hootenanny2_Pointer)

LUI A1 hi(Hootenanny2_Prompt)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(Hootenanny2_Prompt) ; String Format

LBU A2 3(S4) ; Current Player Character Index
ADDIU A2 A2 0x1C00 ; Add to get Character Name

SW A3 16(SP) ; A4
LUI A3 hi(Price1_Pointer)
ADDIU A3 A3 lo(Price1_Pointer)
SW R0 20(SP) ; A5
JAL ShowMessage
SW R0 24(SP) ; A6

JAL DisableOptions ; A0 has Window ID
NOP

JAL GetAISelection ; 0, 1, or 2 (Random)
NOP

LI A0 2 ; Pick whatever is in A1 as AI's Choice
JAL GetBasicPromptSelection
MOVE A1 V0 ; Pick an available
MOVE S7 V0 ; Chosen Option Index

JAL 0x800EC9DC
NOP
JAL CloseMessage ; 3 Functions to close the message properly
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

BEQL S7 R0 doublehootenannyjump ; Branch and use Price2 if they chose EX
LI S6 Price1
LI T0 1 ; Vanilla Hootenanny
BEQL S7 T0 doublehootenannyjump ; Branch and use Price1 if they chose Vanilla
LI S6 Price2

NOP
LI T0 3 ; View Map 
BEQ S7 T0 viewmap
NOP



exit:

LW S1 108(SP)
LW S2 104(SP)
LW S3 100(SP)
LW S4 96(SP)
LW S5 92(SP)
LW S6 88(SP)
LW S7 84(SP)
LW RA 116(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 120

.align 16
RefreshOptionArray:
ADDIU SP SP -40
SW RA 36(SP)

LUI T0 hi(OptionColoring_StaticArray)
ADDIU T0 T0 lo(OptionColoring_StaticArray)
LUI T2 hi(OptionColoring_Array)
ADDIU T2 T2 lo(OptionColoring_Array)
LI T3 0xFF ; Nothing left to refresh
RefreshOptionArray_loop:
LBU T1 0(T0) ; Load first value to refresh array
BEQ T1 T3 RefreshOptionArray_exit ; Leave once it reaches 0xFF
NOP
SB T1 0(T2) ; Store first value to refresh
ADDIU T0 T0 1 ; add 1 to get next value
ADDIU T2 T2 1 ; add 1 to get next value
J RefreshOptionArray_loop
NOP

RefreshOptionArray_exit:
LW RA 36(SP)
JR RA 
ADDIU SP SP 40

; A1 = Message to display (Pointer)

ShowMessage_Function:
ADDIU SP SP -80
SW RA 76(SP)

SW R0 16(SP) ; A4
SW R0 20(SP) ; A5
SW R0 24(SP) ; A6
LI A0 1 ; Character image (Red Koopa)
LI A2 0
JAL ShowMessage
LI A3 0

JAL 0x800EC9DC
NOP
JAL CloseMessage
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

LW RA 76(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 80

; A0 = Type of Fade
; A1 = 0 - FadeOut, 1 - FadeIn
.align 16
InitFade:
ADDIU SP SP -80
SW RA 76(SP)
SW A0 72(SP)

BNEZ A1 fadein ; If 1, it's a fade in
NOP
; If 0, it's a fade out 
LW A0 72(SP) ; Fade Type
JAL InitFadeOut
LI A1 16 ; Frames

J InitFade_exit
NOP

fadein:
LW A0 72(SP) ; Fade Type
JAL InitFadeIn
LI A1 16 ; Frames

InitFade_exit:
JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 16 ; Frames

LW RA 76(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 80


.align 16
GetChainAndSpaceIndexFromAbsSpaceIndex:
//takes arg a0, abs_space_index
//returns chain_index to v0
//returns space_index to v1
ADDIU sp, sp, -0x40 
SW ra, 0x0018 (sp)
SW s0, 0x001C (sp)
SW s1, 0x0020 (sp)
SW s2, 0x0024 (sp)
SW s3, 0x0028 (sp)
SW s4, 0x002C (sp)
SW s5, 0x0030 (sp)
SW s6, 0x0034 (sp)
ORI s3, r0, 0x0000 //init s3 to 0
ADDIU s4, r0, 0xFFFF //init s4 to FFFF, loop1 counter
LUI s0, 0x8010
LW s0, 0x5218 (s0) //load ptr to beginning of hydrated chains ptr
DADDU s1, a0, r0 ;move abs_space_index to s0
Loop:
ADDIU s4, s4, 0x0001 //add 1 to current loop total
LHU s2, 0x0000 (s0) //load total number of space_indicies in chain
BEQ s2, r0, error
NOP
ORI t0, r0, 0x0000 //going to be used for loop 2 counter
LW s3, 0x0004 (s0) //load pointer that points to abs space_indicies for current chain in loop
Loop2:
//
LHU t1, 0x0000 (s3) //load abs value from hydrated chain
BEQ t1, s1, isabs
NOP
ADDIU t0, t0, 0x0001 //add 1 to loop2 counter
BEQ t0, s2, backtoLoop1
NOP
BEQ r0, r0, Loop2
ADDIU s3, s3, 0x0002
returnvalues:
//
GetChainAndSpaceIndexFromAbsSpaceIndex_exit:
LW ra, 0x0018 (sp)
LW s0, 0x001C (sp)
LW s1, 0x0020 (sp)
LW s2, 0x0024 (sp)
LW s3, 0x0028 (sp)
LW s4, 0x002C (sp)
LW s5, 0x0030 (sp)
LW s6, 0x0034 (sp)
JR RA
ADDIU sp, sp, 0x40
error:
ORI v0, r0, 0xFFFF //error, return FFFF
BEQ r0, r0, GetChainAndSpaceIndexFromAbsSpaceIndex_exit
ORI v1, r0, 0xFFFF //error, return FFFF
isabs:
//s4 holds current chain index
//t1 holds current space index in chain
ADD v0, s4, r0 //move chain index to v0
BEQ r0, r0, GetChainAndSpaceIndexFromAbsSpaceIndex_exit
ADD v1, t0, r0 //move space_index to v1
backtoLoop1:
BEQ r0, r0, Loop
ADDIU s0, s0, 0x0008 //advance to next hydrated chains ptr

.align 16
SetPlayerOntoChainVisually:
ADDIU SP SP -80
SW RA 76(SP)
SW S0 72(SP) ; Array Pointer
SB A0 68(SP) ; Player's Index 
SW A2 56(SP) ; Float to adjust X pos

MOVE S0 A1 ; Copy Array Pointer to S0

BNEZ S7 SetPlayerOntoChainVisuallyEX 
NOP

LBU A0 68(SP) ; Player Index
LBU A1 0(S0) ; Assigns Chain Index to A1
JAL SetPlayerOntoChain
LBU A2 1(S0) ; Assigns Space Index to A2

LBU A0 68(SP) ; Player Index
LBU A1 15(S4) ; Assigns Chain Index to A1
JAL SetNextChainAndSpace
LBU A2 16(S4) ; Assigns Space Index to A2

LBU A0 68(SP) ; Player Index
LBU A1 4(S0) ; Assigns Chain Index to A1
JAL SetPrevChainAndSpace
LBU A2 5(S0) ; Assigns Space Index to A2
J visualwarp
NOP

SetPlayerOntoChainVisuallyEX:
LBU A0 68(SP) ; Player Index
LBU A1 15(S4) ; Assigns Chain Index to A1
JAL SetPlayerOntoChain
LBU A2 16(S4) ; Assigns Space Index to A2

LBU A0 68(SP) ; Player Index
LBU A1 2(S0) ; Assigns Chain Index to A1
JAL SetNextChainAndSpace
LBU A2 3(S0) ; Assigns Space Index to A2

LBU A0 68(SP) ; Player Index
LBU A1 0(S0) ; Assigns Chain Index to A1
JAL SetPrevChainAndSpace
LBU A2 1(S0) ; Assigns Space Index to A2


visualwarp:
LBU A0 15(S4) ; Assigns Chain Index to A1
JAL GetAbsSpaceIndexFromChainSpaceIndex ; Gets True Space Index at V0
LBU A1 16(S4) ; Assigns Space Index to A2

JAL GetSpaceData ; Pointer to Space Data at V0
MOVE A0 V0 ; True Space Index

LW T0 56(SP) ; X pos adjustment float to T0
LW V1 8(V0) ; Space X pos
MTC1 V1 F0 ; Space X pos to F0
MTC1 T0 F1 ; X pos adjustment float to F1
ADD.S F0 F0 F1 ; Add/Subtract X pos adjustment
MFC1 V1 F0 ; Copy value to V1
SW V1 64(SP) ; Store on the Stack

LI T0 0x41200000 ; Y pos adjustment
LW V1 16(V0) ; Space Y pos
MTC1 V1 F0 ; Space Y pos to F0
MTC1 T0 F1 ; Y pos adjustment float to F1
ADD.S F0 F0 F1 ; Add Y pos adjustment
MFC1 V1 F0 ; Copy value to V1
SW V1 60(SP) ; Store on the Stack

JAL GetPlayerStruct ; Player Struct at V0
LBU A0 68(SP)  ; Player Index

LW V1 0x24(V0) ; Load Offset 0x24 into V1
ADDIU V1 V1 0xC ; Add 0xC to get current player's X Coords
LW T0 64(SP) ; Load Space X Coords from Stack
SW T0 0(V1) 

ADDIU V1 V1 8 ; This should load current player's Y Coords
LW T1 60(SP) ; Load Space Y Coords from Stack
SW T1 0(V1)

LW S0 72(SP) ; Array Pointer
LW RA 76(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 80

.align 16
GetColorFormatter:
ADDIU SP SP -60
SW RA 56(SP)

LUI V0 hi(BlackColor_ptr)
ADDIU V0 V0 lo(BlackColor_ptr) ; First Option (Hootenanny EX)
LUI T7 hi(OptionColoring_Array)
ADDIU T7 T7 lo(OptionColoring_Array) ; Array for disabling options

LI T8 8 ; White Color

LI T0 Price2
LHU T1 10(S4) ; Current Player's Coins

SLT T6 T1 T0 ; ON IF not enough Coins for Hootenanny EX
BNEZ T6 GetColorFormatter_exit ; exit if not enough Coins 
NOP

LUI V0 hi(WhiteColor_ptr) ; White Color
ADDIU V0 V0 lo(WhiteColor_ptr)
SB T8 1(T7) ; Don't disable 2nd Option (Hootenanny EX)


GetColorFormatter_exit:
LW RA 56(SP)
JR RA 
ADDIU SP SP 60

.align 16
DisableOptions:
ADDIU SP SP -72
SW RA 68(SP)
SW A0 64(SP) ; Window ID
SW FP 60(SP) ; Address of Option Disable Array


LUI FP hi(OptionColoring_Array)
ADDIU FP FP lo(OptionColoring_Array) ; Array of answers to disable
loadbyte:
LBU T0 0(FP) ; Load Byte of Array
LI T1 0xFF
BEQ T0 T1 DisableOptions_exit ; Exit once array is fully checked
NOP
LI T1 8 ; Index to not disable
BEQL T0 T1 loadbyte
ADDIU FP FP 1 ; Load next Byte

LW A0 64(SP) ; Window ID?
JAL DisablePromptOption
MOVE A1 T0 ; Disable First Option

J loadbyte
ADDIU FP FP 1


DisableOptions_exit:
LW FP 60(SP)
LW A0 64(SP)
LW RA 68(SP)
JR RA 
ADDIU SP SP 72

GetAISelection:
ADDIU SP SP -80
SW RA 76(SP)

GetAISelectionreroll:
JAL GetRandomByte ; 0-255 at V0
NOP
LI T0 3 ; 3 Choices
DIVU V0 T0 ; Divide by 3
MFHI V0 ; Remainder to V0 (0-2)

LUI T0 hi(OptionColoring_Array)
ADDIU T0 T0 lo(OptionColoring_Array)
ADDU T0 T0 V0 ; Add the number to get correct array index
LBU T1 0(T0) ; Load color of that option

LI T2 1 ; Black color, option is grayed out
BEQ T1 T2 GetAISelectionreroll ; Reroll if that option isn't available
NOP

LW RA 76(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 80

; https://github.com/PartyPlanner64/PartyPlanner64/wiki/Displaying-Messages

; If you want to know how to put special characters on your message
; or know what they mean, use the following link:
; https://github.com/PartyPlanner64/PartyPlanner64/wiki/String-Encoding
;
; Previously, special characters were put on messages as ".byte" with
; the special character index right after, but we've found that you 
; can actually put the special characters in the ascii by using \x
; So what used to be ".byte 0xC2" for an exclamation mark, can now
; be written as \xC2 to save an entire line of code\xC2 (get it?)

Prediction of Jeanie.code:
; NAME: Prediction of Jeanie
; GAMES: MP3_USA
; EXECUTION: Direct
; PARAM: Space|SpaceDirection

ADDIU SP SP -80
SW RA 76(SP)
SW S1 72(SP) ;holds plant number
SW S2 68(SP) ;used to store various values
SW S3 64(SP) ;holds the RAM address 1 of CW
SW S4 60(SP) ;used for warp & curse values
SW S5 56(SP) ;holds the value of the RAM address 1 of CW
SW S6 52(SP) ;used for the Nipper event
SW S0 48(SP) ;used to store various values

;===Set Player Idle Animation===
LI A0 -1 ; Load Current Player Index
LI A1 -1 ; Set player's idle animation
JAL SetBoardPlayerAnimation
LI A2 2 ; Loop the animation

;===Rotate Player Model Towards Space===
LI A0 -1 ; Load Current Player Index
LI A1 10 ; Frames it takes to turn
JAL 0x800ED20C ; RotatePlayerModel function
LI A2 SpaceDirection ; Space Index to face towards

;FIRST WINDOW===============================================
JAL PlaySound ; Play Sparkles Sound
LI A0 0x11B

JAL SleepProcess ; Sleeps for 40 frames
ADDIU A0 R0 40

SW R0 16(SP) ; A4
SW R0 20(SP) ; A5
SW R0 24(SP) ; A6
LI A0 0x3C ; Character image (Jeanie)
LUI A1 hi(Prediction_Start)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(Prediction_Start)

ADDU A2 R0 R0
JAL 0x800EC8EC ; ShowMessage
ADDU A3 R0 R0

JAL 0x800EC9DC
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6C8
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

JAL PlaySound ; Play Magic Power Sound
LI A0 0x11A

JAL SleepProcess ; Sleeps for 20 frames
ADDIU A0 R0 20
;FIRST WINDOW END===========================================

;SELECTION OF WINDOW===========================================
JAL GetRandomByte ; Random Int at V0
NOP

SLTI S0 V0 80 ; Is the number less than 80?
BNE S0 R0 HappeningTest
NOP

SLTI S0 V0 160 ; Is the number less than 160?
BNE S0 R0 CoinTest
NOP

SLTI S0 V0 240 ; Is the number less than 240?
BNE S0 R0 GameTest
NOP

J LeadingTest
NOP
;END SELECTION OF WINDOW=======================================

;REST OF THE WINDOW===================================================
RestWindow:
SW R0 16(SP) ; A4
SW R0 20(SP) ; A5
SW R0 24(SP) ; A6
LI A0 0x3C ; Character image (Jeanie)
LI A2 0
JAL ShowMessage
LI A3 0

JAL 0x800EC9DC
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6C8
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

JAL SleepProcess ; Sleeps for 15 frames
ADDIU A0 R0 15

J exit
NOP
;REST OF THE WINDOW END===============================================

;CHECKS FOR BONUS STARS===========================================
;HAPPENING STAR
HappeningTest:
JAL GetCurrentPlayerHappeningStarCount
LI S2 0x2;
ADDU S1 S2 V0 ; Add S2 to the value

LUI S2 hi(p1_happening_space_count)
ADDIU S2 S2 lo(p1_happening_space_count) ; Loading P1 ?STAR
LBU S2 0(S2)

SLT S0 S1 S2; Is P1 Happening Star higher than current player?
NOP
BNE S0 R0 NormalWindow 
NOP

LUI S2 hi(p2_happening_space_count)
ADDIU S2 S2 lo(p2_happening_space_count) ; Loading P2 ?STAR
LBU S2 0(S2)

SLT S0 S1 S2; Is P2 Happening Star higher than current player?
NOP
BNE S0 R0 NormalWindow
NOP

LUI S2 hi(p3_happening_space_count)
ADDIU S2 S2 lo(p3_happening_space_count) ; Loading P3 ?STAR
LBU S2 0(S2)

SLT S0 S1 S2; Is P3 Happening Star higher than current player?
NOP
BNE S0 R0 NormalWindow
NOP

LUI S2 hi(p4_happening_space_count)
ADDIU S2 S2 lo(p4_happening_space_count) ; Loading P4 ?STAR
LBU S2 0(S2)

SLT S0 S1 S2; Is P4 Happening Star higher than current player?
NOP
BNE S0 R0 NormalWindow
NOP

J HappeningWindow
NOP
;COIN STAR
CoinTest:
JAL GetCurrentPlayerCoinStarCount
LUI S2 hi(bank_coin_total)
ADDIU S2 S2 lo(bank_coin_total) ; Loading coins in bank in S2
LHU S2 0(S2)
ADDU S1 S2 V0 ; Add S2 to the value

LUI S2 hi(p1_coin_star)
ADDIU S2 S2 lo(p1_coin_star) ; Loading P1 $STAR
LHU S2 0(S2)

SLT S0 S1 S2; Is P1 Coin Star higher than current player?
NOP
BNE S0 R0 NormalWindow
NOP

LUI S2 hi(p2_coin_star)
ADDIU S2 S2 lo(p2_coin_star) ; Loading P2 $STAR
LHU S2 0(S2)

SLT S0 S1 S2; Is P2 Coin Star higher than current player?
NOP
BNE S0 R0 NormalWindow
NOP

LUI S2 hi(p3_coin_star)
ADDIU S2 S2 lo(p3_coin_star) ; Loading P3 $STAR
LHU S2 0(S2)

SLT S0 S1 S2; Is P3 Coin Star higher than current player?
NOP
BNE S0 R0 NormalWindow
NOP

LUI S2 hi(p4_coin_star)
ADDIU S2 S2 lo(p4_coin_star) ; Loading P4 $STAR
LHU S2 0(S2)

SLT S0 S1 S2; Is P4 Coin Star higher than current player?
NOP
BNE S0 R0 NormalWindow
NOP

J CoinWindow
NOP
;GAME STAR
GameTest:
JAL GetCurrentPlayerMiniGameStarCount
LUI S2 hi(current_turn)
ADDIU S2 S2 lo(current_turn) ; Loading current turn number in S2
LBU S2 0(S2)
ADDU S1 S2 V0 ; Add S2 to the value

LUI S2 hi(p1_minigame_star)
ADDIU S2 S2 lo(p1_minigame_star) ; Loading P1 GSTAR
LHU S2 0(S2)

SLT S0 S1 S2; Is P1 MiniGame Star higher than current player?
NOP
BNE S0 R0 NormalWindow
NOP

LUI S2 hi(p2_minigame_star)
ADDIU S2 S2 lo(p2_minigame_star) ; Loading P2 GSTAR
LHU S2 0(S2)

SLT S0 S1 S2; Is P2 MiniGame Star higher than current player?
NOP
BNE S0 R0 NormalWindow
NOP

LUI S2 hi(p3_minigame_star)
ADDIU S2 S2 lo(p3_minigame_star) ; Loading P3 GSTAR
LHU S2 0(S2)

SLT S0 S1 S2; Is P3 MiniGame Star higher than current player?
NOP
BNE S0 R0 NormalWindow
NOP

LUI S2 hi(p4_minigame_star)
ADDIU S2 S2 lo(p4_minigame_star) ; Loading P4 GSTAR
LHU S2 0(S2)

SLT S0 S1 S2; Is P4 MiniGame Star higher than current player?
NOP
BNE S0 R0 NormalWindow
NOP

J GameWindow
NOP
;LEADER TEST
LeadingTest:
JAL GetCurrentPlayerStarCount
NOP
MOVE S2 V0 ; S2 = V0
JAL GetFirstPlaceStarCount
NOP
BEQ S2 V0 LeadingRandom ;Does current player have the same number of stars as first place?
NOP
J NormalWindow
NOP
;LEADER RANDOM
LeadingRandom:
JAL GetRandomByte ; Random Int at V0
NOP

SLTI S0 V0 80 ; Is the number less than 80?
BNE S0 R0 HappeningWindow
NOP

SLTI S0 V0 160 ; Is the number less than 160?
BNE S0 R0 CoinWindow
NOP

SLTI S0 V0 240 ; Is the number less than 240?
BNE S0 R0 GameWindow
NOP

J NormalWindow
NOP
;CHECKS FOR BONUS STARS END=======================================

;ALL THE WINDOWS===============================================
HappeningWindow:
LUI A1 hi(Prediction_Happening)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(Prediction_Happening)
;Implement text of the window
J RestWindow
NOP
GameWindow:
LUI A1 hi(Prediction_Minigame)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(Prediction_Minigame)
;Implement text of the window
J RestWindow
NOP
CoinWindow:
LUI A1 hi(Prediction_Coin)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(Prediction_Coin)
;Implement text of the window
J RestWindow
NOP
NormalWindow:
LUI A1 hi(Prediction_Nothing)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(Prediction_Nothing)
;Implement text of the window
J RestWindow
NOP
;ALL THE WINDOWS END===========================================
exit:
;===Set Player Idle Animation===
LI A0 -1 ; Load Current Player Index
LI A1 -1 ; Set player's idle animation
JAL SetBoardPlayerAnimation
LI A2 2 ; Loop the animation

LW RA 76(SP)
LW S1 72(SP)
LW S2 68(SP)
LW S3 64(SP)
LW S4 60(SP)
LW S5 56(SP)
LW S6 52(SP)
LW S0 48(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 80

Pay to Warp (MP3).code:
; NAME: Pay to Warp (MP3)
; GAMES: MP3_USA
; EXECUTION: Direct
; PARAM: Space|SpaceToFace
; PARAM: +Number|Price
; PARAM: Space[]|Destinations
; PARAM: Space[]|Dest1Forward
; PARAM: Space[]|Dest1Behind
; PARAM: Space[]|Dest2Behind

ADDIU SP SP -64
SW RA 60(SP)
SW S0 56(SP)
SW S1 52(SP)
SW S2 48(SP)
SW S3 44(SP)

; S0 = Current Player Struct
; S1 = Prompt Choice / Reverse Flag
; S2 = Price / Destination Array
; S3 = Randomised Destination

;===Hide Dice Roll===
JAL GetPlayerStruct
LI A0 -1 ; Get current player struct at V0
MOVE S0 V0 ; Copy V0 to S0

JAL 0x800DBEC0 ; HideDiceRoll
LBU A0 0x1D(S0) ; Pass current player index on A0

;===Set Player Idle Animation===
LI A0 -1 ; Set current player
LI A1 -1 ; Set idle animation
JAL SetBoardPlayerAnimation
LI A2 2 ; Loop the animation

;===Rotate Toward Space===
LI A0 -1 ; Set current player
LI A1 8 ; Rotate in 8 frames
JAL RotatePlayerModel
LI A2 SpaceToFace ; Face space

;===Check for Coins===
LUI A0 hi(CoinString)
ADDIU A0 A0 lo(CoinString) ; Parse destination
LUI A1 hi(percent_d)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(percent_d) ; String formatter
JAL sprintf
LI A2 Price ; Convert price to text string

LBU A0 0x1D(S0) ; Pass current player index on A0
JAL PlayerHasCoins
LI A1 Price ; Check for coins

BEQZ V0 NoCoins ; If V0 = 0, go to NoCoins
LI S2 Price ; Load Price into S3

;===Start Prompt===
JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x195 ; Blooper voice

StartPrompt:
LI A0 1 ; Display prompt
LUI A1 hi(WarpPrompt)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(WarpPrompt) ; Display WarpPrompt
LUI A2 hi(CoinString)
JAL CallMessage
ADDIU A2 A2 lo(CoinString) ; String #1 (Price)

JAL RNGPercentChance
LI A0 50 ; 50% chance of V0 = 1

; Get the selection, either from the player or CPU.
; If A0 is a pointer to AI data, AI logic is ran to pick for CPUs.
; If A0 is 0 or 1, the 0th or 1st option is chosen by CPUs.
; If A0 is 2, then the value of A1 is the CPUs option index choice.
LI A0 2 ; Pick whatever is in A1 as AI's Choice
JAL GetBasicPromptSelection
MOVE A1 V0 ; A1 now has the AI's decision
MOVE S1 V0 ; S1 now has the chosen option index

; Obligatory message box closing/cleanup calls.
JAL CloseMessage
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

; Change the player's destination based on the choice.
BEQZ S1 SayYes ; If V0 = 0, say yes
NOP
LI T0 1
BEQ S1 T0 SayNo ; If V0 = 1, say no
NOP
; else pick "View map"
JAL ViewBoardMap
NOP
J StartPrompt
NOP

;===Say Yes===
SayYes:
LBU A0 0x1D(S0) ; Pass current player index on A0
JAL AdjustPlayerCoinsGradual
SUBU A1 R0 S2 ; Pay coins

LBU A0 0x1D(S0) ; Pass current player index on A0
JAL ShowPlayerCoinChange
SUBU A1 R0 S2 ; Pay coins

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 30 ; Wait 30 frames for coin change

;===Say Yes Message===
SkipLoseCoins:
JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x195 ; Blooper voice

LI A0 0 ; Display message
LUI A1 hi(YesMessage)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(YesMessage) ; Display YesMessage
JAL CallMessage
LI A2 0 ; No string

;===Fade-out and Sound===
LI A0 1 ; Assigns circle fade-out
JAL InitFadeOut ; Fade to black
LI A1 16 ; Assigns 16 frames of fade-out

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 17 ; Wait 17 frames for fade-out

JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x107 ; Warp Block sound

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 20 ; Wait 20 frames for sound

;===Determine Destination===
JAL GetRandomByte ; Get random byte (0-255) at V0
NOP
LI T0 Destinations_length ; Load no. of destinations into T0
DIVU V0 T0 ; Divide V0 by T0
MFHI S3 ; Move the remainder into S3

LUI S2 hi(DestinationArray)
ADDIU S2 S2 lo(DestinationArray)
ADDU S2 S2 S3 ; Add random number to DestinationArray

;===Set Destination===
LUI T0 hi(DestChArray)
ADDIU T0 T0 lo(DestChArray) ; Load DestinationChainArray into T0
ADDU T0 T0 S3 ; Add to get randomised destination chain
LUI T1 hi(DestChSpArray)
ADDIU T1 T1 lo(DestChSpArray) ; Load DestinationChainSpaceArray into T1
ADDU T1 T1 S3 ; Add to get randomised destination chain space

LI A0 -1 ; Set current player
LBU A1 0(T0) ; Pass Destination chain index on A1
JAL SetPlayerOntoChain
LBU A2 0(T1) ; Pass Destination chain space index on A2

;===Check Reverse Status for Next===
LBU T0 0x17(S0) ; Load status flags from offset of player struct
ANDI S1 T0 1 ; AND with 1 (going backwards)
BNEZ S1 SetReverseNext ; If S1 = 1, set reverse next
NOP
; else, set forward next

;===Set Forward Next===
LUI T0 hi(Dest1FChArray)
ADDIU T0 T0 lo(Dest1FChArray) ; Load Dest1ForwardChainArray into T0
ADDU T0 T0 S3 ; Add to get randomised destination 1 forward chain
LUI T1 hi(Dest1FChSpArray)
ADDIU T1 T1 lo(Dest1FChSpArray) ; Load Dest1ForwardChainSpaceArray into T1
J SetNext
ADDU T1 T1 S3 ; Add to get randomised destination 1 forward chain space

;===Set Reverse Next===
SetReverseNext:
LUI T0 hi(Dest1BChArray)
ADDIU T0 T0 lo(Dest1BChArray) ; Load Dest1BehindChainArray into T0
ADDU T0 T0 S3 ; Add to get randomised destination 1 behind chain
LUI T1 hi(Dest1BChSpArray)
ADDIU T1 T1 lo(Dest1BChSpArray) ; Load Dest1BehindChainSpaceArray into T1
ADDU T1 T1 S3 ; Add to get randomised destination 1 behind chain space

;===Set Next===
SetNext:
LI A0 -1 ; Set current player
LBU A1 0(T0) ; Pass next chain index on A1
JAL SetNextChainAndSpace
LBU A2 0(T1) ; Pass next chain space index on A2

BNEZ S1 SetReversePrev ; If S1 = 1, set reverse prev
NOP
; else, set forward prev

;===Set Forward Prev===
LUI T0 hi(Dest1BChArray)
ADDIU T0 T0 lo(Dest1BChArray) ; Load Dest1BehindChainArray into T0
ADDU T0 T0 S3 ; Add to get randomised destination 1 behind chain
LUI T1 hi(Dest1BChSpArray)
ADDIU T1 T1 lo(Dest1BChSpArray) ; Load Dest1BehindChainSpaceArray into T1
J SetPrev
ADDU T1 T1 S3 ; Add to get randomised destination 1 behind chain space

;===Set Reverse Prev===
SetReversePrev:
LUI T0 hi(Dest2BChArray)
ADDIU T0 T0 lo(Dest2BChArray) ; Load Dest2BehindChainArray into T0
ADDU T0 T0 S3 ; Add to get randomised destination 2 behind chain
LUI T1 hi(Dest2BChSpArray)
ADDIU T1 T1 lo(Dest2BChSpArray) ; Load Dest2BehindChainSpaceArray into T1
ADDU T1 T1 S3 ; Add to get randomised destination 2 behind chain space

;===Set Prev===
SetPrev:
LI A0 -1 ; Set current player
LBU A1 0(T0) ; Pass prev chain index on A1
JAL SetPrevChainAndSpace
LBU A2 0(T1) ; Pass prev chain space index on A2

;===Set Player Coords===
JAL GetSpaceData
LBU A0 0(S2) ; Get Destination space data at V0
LW T0 8(V0) ; Load space x coords into T0
LW T1 16(V0) ; Load space y coords into T1

LW T2 0x24(S0) ; Load coords pointer from offset of player struct
SW T0 12(T2) ; Store space x coords into player coords
SW T1 20(T2) ; Store space y coords into player coords

;===Finish Warp===
LI A0 -1 ; Set current player
LI A1 1 ; Rotate in 1 frame
JAL RotatePlayerModel
LBU A2 0(S2) ; Face Destination space

LI A0 1 ; Assigns circle fade-in
JAL InitFadeIn ; Fade from black
LI A1 16 ; Assigns 16 frames of fade-in

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 17 ; Wait 17 frames for fade-in

;===Message and Turn Flag ON===
LI A0 0 ; Display message
LUI A1 hi(WarpedMessage)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(WarpedMessage) ; Display WarpedMessage
JAL CallMessage
LI A2 0 ; No string

J Outro
NOP

;===Say No===
SayNo:
JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x195 ; Blooper voice

LI A0 0 ; Display message
LUI A1 hi(NoMessage)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(NoMessage) ; Display NoMessage
JAL CallMessage
LI A2 0 ; No string

J Outro
NOP

;===No Coins Message===
NoCoins:
JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x195 ; Blooper voice

LI A0 0 ; Display message
LUI A1 hi(NoCoinsMessage)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(NoCoinsMessage) ; Display NoCoinsMessage
LUI A2 hi(CoinString)
JAL CallMessage
ADDIU A2 A2 lo(CoinString) ; String #1 (Price)

;===Show Dice Roll===
Outro:
JAL 0x800DB884 ; ShowDiceRoll
LBU A0 0x1D(S0) ; Pass current player index on A0

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 10 ; Wait 10 frames for dice roll to show

exit:
LW RA 60(SP)
LW S0 56(SP)
LW S1 52(SP)
LW S2 48(SP)
LW S3 44(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 64

;===Prep for Displaying Coin String===
.align 16
percent_d:
.asciiz "%d" ; 0x25640000

.align 16
CoinString:
.fill 8

;===Mini Func to Call Message===
.align 4
CallMessage:
ADDIU SP SP -40
SW RA 36(SP)
SW S0 32(SP)

; A0 / S0 = Message or Prompt
; A1 = Message Address
; A2 = String #1

MOVE S0 A0 ; Copy A0 to S0
SW R0 16(SP) ; A4
SW R0 20(SP) ; A5
SW R0 24(SP) ; A6
LI A0 0x3A ; Character image (-1 for none, 0x3A for Blooper)
; Visit the following link to get the full list of Character Images
; https://github.com/PartyPlanner64/PartyPlanner64/wiki/Displaying-Messages
; If you use a character image, check the bottom of the code
; Pass message address on A1
; Pass string #1 on A2
JAL ShowMessage
LI A3 0

BNEZ S0 CallMessageExit ; If displaying a prompt, exit
NOP

; Obligatory message box closing/cleanup calls.
JAL 0x800EC9DC
NOP
JAL CloseMessage
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

CallMessageExit:
LW RA 36(SP)
LW S0 32(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 40

Koopa Kid Space (Airsola™).code:
; NAME: Koopa Kid Space (Airsola™)
; GAMES: MP3_USA
; EXECUTION: Direct
; PARAM: Number|EventIndex

ADDIU SP SP -120
SW RA 116(SP)
SW S4 112(SP) ; Current Player's Struct
SW S0 108(SP) ; Player Index for Loop Counter
SW S3 104(SP) ; Equalized Coins / Chosen Player's Struct
SW S1 100(SP) ; Player's Coins 
SW S5 96(SP) ; Current Player's Coins
SW S7 92(SP) ; Flag Holder for Loops
SW S6 88(SP) ; Counter for Loop

;====================================================================
; IMPORTANT: This code is designed to replicate the Koopa Kid Space 
;            from Mario Party 7. If the EventIndex parameter is set to
;            0, it will randomize 1 of the following 6 events:
;			 (1) Turn player's next roll is cursed.
;			 (2) Equalize all player's coins. (Bowser Revolution)
;			 (3) Swap turn player's coins with a random player.
;			 (4) Swap turn player's position with a random player.
;			 (5) Shuffle the position of all players. (Bowser Shuffle)
;			 (6) Shuffle all player's items 
;			 
;            If you would rather use only 1 of these events, all you
;            have to do is set the EventIndex parameter to the
;            corresponding index listed in the parenthesis above.
;            While this event is made to be a landing event, it should
;            work fine as a passing event, too.
;			 
;			 At the bottom of the code you will find useful links and
;			 explanations for some technical things in the code.
;====================================================================

LI A0 -1 ; Current Player
LI A1 -1 ; Idle Animation
JAL SetBoardPlayerAnimation ; in case some maniac wants to make this a passing event...
LI A3 2 ; Loop

JAL GetPlayerStruct ; Struct at V0
LI A0 -1 ; Current Player
MOVE S4 V0 ; Copy Struct to S4

JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x2A0 ; Koopa Kid Bark sfx

LUI A1 hi(Intro_Message)
JAL ShowMessage_Function ; Display and Close Message
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(Intro_Message)

LUI A1 hi(Intro2_Message)
JAL ShowMessage_Function ; Display and Close Message
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(Intro2_Message)

LI T0 EventIndex 
BEQZ T0 randomizeevent ; If 0, randomize which event happens
NOP
chooseevent:
LI T1 1 ; Cursed Mushroom Event Index
BEQ T0 T1 cursedmushroom ; If 1, give a cursed mushroom
NOP
LI T1 2 ; Revolution Event Index
BEQ T0 T1 revolution ; If 2, coin revolution
NOP
LI T1 3 ; Coin Swap Event Index
BEQ T0 T1 coinswap ; If 3, swap coins with someone else
NOP
LI T1 4 ; Space Swap Event Index
BEQ T0 T1 spaceswap ; If 4, swap spaces with someone else
NOP
LI T1 5 ; Space Shuffle Event Index
BEQ T0 T1 spaceshuffle ; If 5, shuffle everyone's position
NOP
J itemshuffle ; If none of the others, shuffle everyone's items
NOP

randomizeevent:
JAL GetRandomByte ; Number from 0-255 at V0
NOP
LI T0 6 
DIVU V0 T0 ; Divide by 6 events
MFHI T0 ; Remainder of division (0-5)
J chooseevent
ADDIU T0 T0 1 ; Add 1 so it's 1-6

;================================================CURSED MUSHROOM EVENT

cursedmushroom:
LI T0 0x800CD0AF ; Address of Cursed Dice Flags
LBU T1 0(T0) ; Value of Cursed Dice Flags
LBU T2 29(S4) ; Current Player's Index
LI T3 1
SLLV T3 T3 T2 ; Shift Left by Player's Index
AND T4 T1 T3 ; T4 = 1 if player is cursed, 0 if not
BEQZ T4 cursedmushroom2 ; If not cursed, continue
NOP 

LI T5 EventIndex
BEQZ T0 randomizeevent ; If the creator chose to randomize the event, pick a different one.
NOP
J alreadycursed ; If set to curse only, generate message saying they're already cursed.
NOP

cursedmushroom2:
ADDU T1 T1 T3 ; Add player's curse flag
SB T1 0(T0) ; Store the new flag value
LBU T0 23(S4) ; Current Player's Status Flag
ADDIU T0 T0 2 ; Add Poison Mushroom Head Value
SB T0 23(S4) ; Store new Status Flag

JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x2A0 ; Koopa Kid Bark sfx

LUI A1 hi(Cursed_Message)
JAL ShowMessage_Function ; Display and Close Message
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(Cursed_Message)

JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0xD ; Cursed Mushroom sfx

LBU A0 29(S4) ; Current Player's Index
JAL SetBoardPlayerAnimationWithSound
LI A1 1 ; 0 = Happy, 1 = Sad

JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x2A0 ; Koopa Kid Bark sfx

LUI A1 hi(CurseExplanation_Message)
JAL ShowMessage_Function ; Display and Close Message
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(CurseExplanation_Message)

J goodbye
NOP

;=====================================================REVOLUTION EVENT

revolution:
JAL GetSumOfPlayerCoins ; Total Coins at V0
NOP
MOVE S0 V0 ; Copy to S0

BNEZ S0 revolution2 ; If there's at least 1 coin total, proceed
NOP

LI T0 EventIndex 
BEQZ T0 randomizeevent ; If the creator chose to randomize the event, pick a different one.
NOP
J nocoinsforrevolution
NOP

revolution2:
JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x2A0 ; Koopa Kid Bark sfx

LUI A1 hi(Revolution_Message)
JAL ShowMessage_Function ; Display and Close Message
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(Revolution_Message)

LI T0 4 
DIVU S0 T0 ; Divide by 4
MFLO S3 ; Coins to give back

LHU S5 10(S4) ; Current Player's Coins

LI S0 3 ; Start with Player 4
revolutionloop:
BLTZ S0 revolutionloop_exit ; exit loop once all players lose their coins
NOP

JAL GetPlayerStruct ; Struct at V0
MOVE A0 S0 ; Player Index
LHU S1 10(V0) ; Coins

MOVE A0 S0 ; Player's Index
JAL AdjustPlayerCoinsGradual 
SUBU A1 R0 S1 ; Coins

MOVE A0 S0 ; Player's Index
JAL 0x800E1F28 ; ShowPlayerCoinChangeHUD
SUBU A1 R0 S1 ; Coins

J revolutionloop
ADDIU S0 S0 -1 ; Subtract 1 to get next player

revolutionloop_exit:
JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 30 ; Frames

LI S0 3 ; Start with Player 4
revolutionloop2:
BLTZ S0 revolutionloop_exit2 ; exit loop once all players get their coins
NOP

MOVE A0 S0 ; Player Index
JAL AdjustPlayerCoinsGradual
MOVE A1 S3 ; Coins

MOVE A0 S0 ; Player Index
JAL 0x800E1F28 ; ShowPlayerCoinChangeHUD
MOVE A1 S3 ; Coins

J revolutionloop2
ADDIU S0 S0 -1

revolutionloop_exit2:
JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 30 ; Frames

SLT T0 S3 S5 ; T0 = 1 if the amount of coins is now lower
BNEZL T0 revolution3 ; If the player has less coins, sad animation
LI A1 1 ; Sad Index
LI A1 0 ; Happy animation if the player has more coins

revolution3:
JAL SetBoardPlayerAnimationWithSound
LBU A0 29(S4) ; Current Player's Index

J goodbye
NOP

;======================================================COIN SWAP EVENT

coinswap:
JAL GetSumOfPlayerCoins ; Total at V0
NOP

BNEZ V0 coinswap2 ; If there's at least 1 coin, continue
NOP

LI T0 EventIndex 
BEQZ T0 randomizeevent ; If the creator chose to randomize the event, pick a different one.
NOP
J nocoinsforrevolution
NOP

coinswap2:
JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x2A0 ; Koopa Kid Bark sfx

LUI A1 hi(CoinSwap_Message)
JAL ShowMessage_Function ; Display and Close Message
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(CoinSwap_Message)

coinswapreroll:
JAL GetRandomByte ; 0-255 Number at V0
NOP
LI T0 4
DIVU V0 T0 ; Divide by 4 to get other player
MFHI V0 ; Remainder of division at V0 (0-3)
LBU T0 29(S4) ; Current Player's Index
BEQ V0 T0 coinswapreroll ; If it's the current player, reroll
NOP

JAL GetPlayerStruct ; Struct at V0
MOVE A0 V0 ; Chosen Player's Index
MOVE S3 V0 ; Copy Struct to S3

LHU T0 10(S4) ; Current Player's Coins
SH T0 76(SP) ; Store in the Stack for future use
LHU T1 10(S3) ; Chosen Player's Coins
SH T1 72(SP) ; Store in the Stack for future use

LBU A0 29(S4) ; Current Player's Index
JAL AdjustPlayerCoinsGradual
SUBU A1 R0 T0 ; Subtract all Coins

LHU T0 76(SP) ; Load Current Player's Coins from the Stack
LBU A0 29(S4) ; Current Player's Index
JAL 0x800E1F28 ; ShowPlayerCoinChangeHUD
SUBU A1 R0 T0 ; Subtract all Coins
;====
LHU T0 72(SP) ; Load Chosen Player's Coins from the Stack
LBU A0 29(S3) ; Current Player's Index
JAL AdjustPlayerCoinsGradual
SUBU A1 R0 T0 ; Subtract all Coins

LHU T0 72(SP) ; Load Chosen Player's Coins from the Stack
LBU A0 29(S3) ; Current Player's Index
JAL 0x800E1F28 ; ShowPlayerCoinChangeHUD
SUBU A1 R0 T0 ; Subtract all Coins

JAL SleepProcess 
LI A0 45 ; Sleeps for 45 frames
;====
LBU A0 29(S4) ; Current Player's Index
JAL AdjustPlayerCoinsGradual
LHU A1 72(SP) ; Add chosen player's Coins

LBU A0 29(S4) ; Current Player's Index
JAL 0x800E1F28 ; ShowPlayerCoinChangeHUD
LHU A1 72(SP) ; Add chosen player's Coins
;====
LBU A0 29(S3) ; Current Player's Index
JAL AdjustPlayerCoinsGradual
LHU A1 76(SP) ; Add chosen player's Coins

LBU A0 29(S3) ; Current Player's Index
JAL 0x800E1F28 ; ShowPlayerCoinChangeHUD
LHU A1 76(SP) ; Add chosen player's Coins

JAL SleepProcess 
LI A0 30 ; Sleeps for 30 frames

LHU T0 76(SP) ; Current Player's Original Coin Amount
LHU T1 72(SP) ; Chosen Player's Original Coin amount
SLT T2 T1 T0 ; T0 = 1 if the amount of coins is now lower
BNEZL T2 coinswap3 ; If the player has less coins, sad animation
LI A1 1 ; Sad Index
LI A1 0 ; Happy animation if the player has more coins

coinswap3:
JAL SetBoardPlayerAnimationWithSound
LBU A0 29(S4) ; Current Player's Index

J goodbye
NOP

;=====================================================SPACE SWAP EVENT

spaceswap:
JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x2A0 ; Koopa Kid Bark sfx

LUI A1 hi(SpaceSwap_Message)
JAL ShowMessage_Function ; Display and Close Message
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(SpaceSwap_Message)

spaceswapreroll:
JAL GetRandomByte ; 0-255 Number at V0
NOP
LI T0 4
DIVU V0 T0 ; Divide by 4 to get other player
MFHI V0 ; Remainder of division at V0 (0-3)
LBU T0 29(S4) ; Current Player's Index
BEQ V0 T0 spaceswapreroll ; If it's the current player, reroll
NOP

JAL GetPlayerStruct ; Struct at V0
MOVE A0 V0 ; Chosen Player's Index
MOVE S3 V0 ; Copy Struct to S3

LI A0 1 ; Fade style (Circle)
JAL InitFade
LI A1 0 ; Fade type (out)

JAL PlaySound 
LI A0 0x107 ; Warp Block Sound Index

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 15 ; Frames

LUI T1 hi(CurrentPlayerSpaces_Array)
ADDIU T1 T1 lo(CurrentPlayerSpaces_Array)

LBU T0 15(S4) ; Current Player's Current Chain Index
SB T0 0(T1) ; Store in the Array
LBU T0 16(S4) ; Current Player's Current Chain Space Index
SB T0 1(T1) ; Store in the Array
LBU T0 17(S4) ; Current Player's Next Chain Index
SB T0 2(T1) ; Store in the Array
LBU T0 18(S4) ; Current Player's Next Chain Space Index
SB T0 3(T1) ; Store in the Array
LBU T0 21(S4) ; Current Player's Previous Chain Index
SB T0 4(T1) ; Store in the Array
LBU T0 22(S4) ; Current Player's Previous Chain Space Index
SB T0 5(T1) ; Store in the Array

LUI T1 hi(ChosenPlayerSpaces_Array)
ADDIU T1 T1 lo(ChosenPlayerSpaces_Array)

LBU T0 15(S3) ; Chosen Player's Current Chain Index
SB T0 0(T1) ; Store in the Array
LBU T0 16(S3) ; Chosen Player's Current Chain Space Index
SB T0 1(T1) ; Store in the Array
LBU T0 17(S3) ; Chosen Player's Next Chain Index
SB T0 2(T1) ; Store in the Array
LBU T0 18(S3) ; Chosen Player's Next Chain Space Index
SB T0 3(T1) ; Store in the Array
LBU T0 21(S3) ; Chosen Player's Previous Chain Index
SB T0 4(T1) ; Store in the Array
LBU T0 22(S3) ; Chosen Player's Previous Chain Space Index
SB T0 5(T1) ; Store in the Array

LBU A0 29(S4) ; Current Player's Index
LUI A1 hi(ChosenPlayerSpaces_Array)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(ChosenPlayerSpaces_Array)
JAL SetPlayerOntoChainVisually ; This sets the player visually and internally on the spaces
NOP

LBU A0 29(S3) ; Current Player's Index
LUI A1 hi(CurrentPlayerSpaces_Array)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(CurrentPlayerSpaces_Array)
JAL SetPlayerOntoChainVisually ; This sets the player visually and internally on the spaces
NOP

JAL PlaySound 
LI A0 0x107 ; Warp Block Sound Index

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 15 ; Frames

LI A0 1 ; Fade style (Circle)
JAL InitFade
LI A1 1 ; Fade type (In)

J goodbye
NOP

;==================================================SPACE SHUFFLE EVENT

spaceshuffle:
JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x2A0 ; Koopa Kid Bark sfx

LUI A1 hi(SpaceShuffle_Message)
JAL ShowMessage_Function ; Display and Close Message
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(SpaceShuffle_Message)

LI A0 1 ; Fade style (Circle)
JAL InitFade
LI A1 0 ; Fade type (out)

JAL PlaySound 
LI A0 0x107 ; Warp Block Sound Index

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 15 ; Frames

LUI S5 hi(Player1Spaces_Array)
ADDIU S5 S5 lo(Player1Spaces_Array)
LI S0 3 ; Start with Player 4
spaceshuffleloop:
BLTZ S0 spaceshuffleloop_exit ; exit once all player's positions are stored
NOP 
JAL GetPlayerStruct ; Struct at V0
MOVE A0 S0 ; Player Index

SLL T1 S0 0x0005 ; Multiply Player Index by 20 for alignment of Array
ADDU T1 T1 S5 ; Add to get the correct Array

LBU T0 15(V0) ; Player's Current Chain Index
SB T0 0(T1) ; Store in the Array
LBU T0 16(V0) ; Player's Current Chain Space Index
SB T0 1(T1) ; Store in the Array
LBU T0 17(V0) ; Player's Next Chain Index
SB T0 2(T1) ; Store in the Array
LBU T0 18(V0) ; Player's Next Chain Space Index
SB T0 3(T1) ; Store in the Array
LBU T0 21(V0) ; Player's Previous Chain Index
SB T0 4(T1) ; Store in the Array
LBU T0 22(V0) ; Player's Previous Chain Space Index
SB T0 5(T1) ; Store in the Array

J spaceshuffleloop
ADDIU S0 S0 -1 ; Subtract 1 to get the next player

spaceshuffleloop_exit:
LI S0 3 ; Start with Player 4
LI S7 0xF ; 1111 Flag for players whose position isn't taken yet
spaceshuffleloop2:
BLTZ S0 spaceshuffleloop2_exit ; exit once all players are affected
NOP
LI T0 1
BEQ S0 T0 spaceshuffleproblemcheck ; branch when it's Player 2's turn to check availability
NOP
spaceshufflerandomize:
JAL GetRandomByte ; 0-255 Number at V0
NOP
LI T0 4
DIVU V0 T0 ; Divide by 4 to get other player
MFHI V0 ; Remainder of division at V0 (0-3)
BEQ V0 S0 spaceshuffleloop2 ; If it's the current player, reroll
NOP
spaceshuffleskiprandomization:
LI T0 1
SLLV T0 T0 V0 ; Shift bit to the left by Player's Index
AND T2 T0 S7 ; T2 = 1 if the chosen player's location is available
BEQZ T2 spaceshuffleloop2 ; reroll if that player's location isn't available
NOP
SUBU S7 S7 T2 ; Turn flag off for that player's location
SLL A1 V0 0x0005 ; Multiply Player Index by 20 for alignment of Array

MOVE A0 S0 ; Player Index
JAL SetPlayerOntoChainVisually
ADDU A1 A1 S5 ; Add to get the correct Array

J spaceshuffleloop2
ADDIU S0 S0 -1 ; Subtract 1 to warp the next player

spaceshuffleproblemcheck:
ANDI T1 S7 1 ; T1 = 1 if Player 1's spot is available
BNEZL T1 spaceshuffleskiprandomization ; If it's available, branch and choose Player 1
LI V0 0 
J spaceshufflerandomize ; If not available, branch and randomize selection
NOP

spaceshuffleloop2_exit:
JAL PlaySound 
LI A0 0x107 ; Warp Block Sound Index

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 15 ; Frames

LI A0 1 ; Fade style (Circle)
JAL InitFade
LI A1 1 ; Fade type (In)

J goodbye
NOP

;===================================================ITEM SHUFFLE EVENT

itemshuffle:
JAL GetSumOfPlayerItems
NOP

BNEZ V0 itemshuffle2 ; If anything other than 0, continue
NOP

LI T0 EventIndex 
BEQZ T0 randomizeevent ; If the creator chose to randomize the event, pick a different one.
NOP
J noitemsforshuffle
NOP

itemshuffle2:
JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x2A0 ; Koopa Kid Bark sfx

LUI A1 hi(ItemShuffle_Message)
JAL ShowMessage_Function ; Display and Close Message
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(ItemShuffle_Message)

LUI S5 hi(ItemShuffle_Array)
ADDIU S5 S5 lo(ItemShuffle_Array)
LI S0 3 ; Start with Player 4
LI S3 0 ; Item Counter
itemshuffleloop:
BLTZ S0 itemshuffleloop_exit ; Exit once all player's items are gathered
NOP

JAL GetPlayerStruct ; Struct at V0
MOVE A0 S0 ; Player Index

LI T0 0xFF ; No item

LBU T2 24(V0) ; Item #1 Index
SB T0 24(V0) ; Delete Item
ADDU T1 S5 S3 ; Add Item Counter to get the right spot in the Array
SB T2 0(T1) ; Store in Array
ADDIU S3 S3 1 ; Add 1 to Item Counter

LBU T2 25(V0) ; Item #2 Index
SB T0 25(V0) ; Delete Item
ADDU T1 S5 S3 ; Add Item Counter to get the right spot in the Array
SB T2 0(T1) ; Store in Array
ADDIU S3 S3 1 ; Add 1 to Item Counter

LBU T2 26(V0) ; Item #3 Index
SB T0 26(V0) ; Delete Item
ADDU T1 S5 S3 ; Add Item Counter to get the right spot in the Array
SB T2 0(T1) ; Store in Array
ADDIU S3 S3 1 ; Add 1 to Item Counter

JAL RefreshHUD
MOVE A0 S0 ; Player Index

J itemshuffleloop
ADDIU S0 S0 -1 ; Subtract 1 to get next player 

itemshuffleloop_exit:
JAL PlaySound 
LI A0 0x367 ; Items Going in Sound Index
JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 30

JAL PlaySound 
LI A0 0x320 ; Items Shuffle Sound Index
JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 60 ; Frames


LI S7 0 ; bit flag for equal distribution
Mshuffleitemsloop2:
LI S6 0 ; Counter for no items left
LI T1 0xF ; All players given an item
BEQL S7 T1 Mshuffleitemsloop2
LI S7 0 ; Reset flag
JAL GetRandomByte ; 0-255 at V0
NOP 
LI T0 4 
DIVU V0 T0 ; Divide by 4
MFHI S0 ; Player's Index (0-3)

LI T1 1 
SLLV T2 T1 S0 ; Shift Left by Player Index 

AND V1 S7 T2 ; Compare Flag Value to Player Index
; V1 returns 0 if player has not been given an item, 1 if they have.
BNEZ V1 Mshuffleitemsloop2
NOP

MOVE T5 S5 ; Pass Array to T5
Mshuffleitemsloop3:
LI T1 12 
BEQ S6 T1 goodbye ; exit because there's no items left
NOP
LBU T3 0(T5) ; Load Item Index from Array
LI T1 0xFF ; No Item
ADDIU T5 T5 1 ; add to check next spot in the array
BEQL T3 T1 Mshuffleitemsloop3 ; 
ADDIU S6 S6 1 ; Add 1 to counter

Mshuffleitemsloop4:
JAL GetRandomByte ; 0-255 at V0
NOP 
LI T0 12
DIVU V0 T0 ; Divide by 12
MFHI T6 ; 12 Item spots (0-11)
ADDU T1 S5 T6 ; Add to get correct space in the Array
LBU S3 0(T1) ; Load Item Index from Array
LI T3 0xFF ; No Item Index
BEQ S3 T3 Mshuffleitemsloop4 ; loop if there's no item in that spot
NOP
SB T3 0(T1) ; Delete Item from the Array

JAL GetPlayerStruct ; at V0
MOVE A0 S0 ; Player Index

MOVE S6 V0 ; Copy Struct to S6

JAL PlayerHasEmptyItemSlot ; 0,1,2 at V0
MOVE A0 S0 ; Player Index

ADDIU S6 S6 24 ; Item #1 Address
ADDU S6 S6 V0 ; Add to get correct Item Slot Address
SB S3 0(S6) ; Give Item

JAL PlaySound
LI A0 25 ; Got Item Sound Index
JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 20 ; Frames

LI T1 1 
SLLV T2 T1 S0 ; Shift Left by Player Index 
J Mshuffleitemsloop2
ADDU S7 S7 T2 ; Mark the player as given an item




goodbye:

LI A0 0x2A0 ; Koopa Kid Bark sfx

JAL ShowMessage_Function ; Display and Close Message
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(Goodbye_Message)

NOP

exit:
LW S4 112(SP) ; Current Player's Struct
LW S0 108(SP) ; Player Index for Loop Counter
LW S3 104(SP) ; Equalized Coins / Chosen Player's Struct
LW S1 100(SP) ; Player's Coins 
LW S5 96(SP) ; Current Player's Coins
LW S7 92(SP) ; Flag Holder for Loops
LW S6 88(SP) ; Counter for Loop
LW RA 116(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 120



; A1 = Message to display (Pointer)
.align 16
ShowMessage_Function:
ADDIU SP SP -80
SW RA 76(SP)

SW R0 16(SP) ; A4
SW R0 20(SP) ; A5
SW R0 24(SP) ; A6
LI A0 5 ; Character image (Koopa Kid)
LI A2 0
JAL ShowMessage
LI A3 0

JAL 0x800EC9DC
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6C8
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

LW RA 76(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 80

; A0 = Player's Index
; A1 = Happy/Sad Index
.align 16
SetBoardPlayerAnimationWithSound:
ADDIU SP SP -80
SW RA 76(SP)
SW A0 72(SP)
SW A1 68(SP)

JAL GetPlayerStruct
NOP

LBU T0 3(V0) ; Character Index

BNEZ A1 sad
NOP

happy:
JAL PlaySound
ADDIU A0 T0 0x275 ; Mario's Happy Voice Index + Current Character Index

LW A0 72(SP) ; Player Index
LI A1 5 ; Happy Animation
JAL SetBoardPlayerAnimation
LI A2 0 ; Don't loop

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 30 ; Frames

J SetBoardAnimationWithSound_exit
NOP

sad:
JAL PlaySound
ADDIU A0 T0 0x287 ; Mario's Sad Voice Index + Current Character Index

LW A0 72(SP) ; Player Index
LI A1 3 ; Despair Animation
JAL SetBoardPlayerAnimation
LI A2 0 ; Don't loop

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 60 ; Frames

SetBoardAnimationWithSound_exit:
LW A0 72(SP) ; Player Index
LI A1 -1 ; Despair Animation
JAL SetBoardPlayerAnimation
LI A2 2 ; Loop

LW A1 68(SP)
LW A0 72(SP)
LW RA 76(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 80

.align 16
GetSumOfPlayerCoins:
ADDIU SP SP -80
SW RA 76(SP)

LI T0 0x800D1112 ; P1 Coins Address
LHU V0 0(T0) ; P1 Coins Value to V0

LI T0 0x800D114A ; P2 Coins Address
LHU T1 0(T0) ; P2 Coins Value to T1
ADDU V0 V0 T1 ; Add P2's coins to P1

LI T0 0x800D1182 ; P3 Coins Address
LHU T1 0(T0) ; P3 Coins Value to T1
ADDU V0 V0 T1 ; Add P3's coins to total

LI T0 0x800D11BA ; P4 Coins Address
LHU T1 0(T0) ; P4 Coins Value to T1
ADDU V0 V0 T1 ; Add P4's coins to total

LW RA 76(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 80

; A0 = Type of Fade
; A1 = 0 - FadeOut, 1 - FadeIn
.align 16
InitFade:
ADDIU SP SP -80
SW RA 76(SP)
SW A0 72(SP)

BNEZ A1 fadein ; If 1, it's a fade in
NOP
; If 0, it's a fade out 
LW A0 72(SP) ; Fade Type
JAL InitFadeOut
LI A1 16 ; Frames

J InitFade_exit
NOP

fadein:
LW A0 72(SP) ; Fade Type
JAL InitFadeIn
LI A1 16 ; Frames

InitFade_exit:
JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 16 ; Frames

LW RA 76(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 80

.align 16
SetPlayerOntoChainVisually:
ADDIU SP SP -80
SW RA 76(SP)
SW S0 72(SP) ; Array Pointer
SB A0 68(SP) ; Player's Index 

MOVE S0 A1 ; Copy Array Pointer to S0

LBU A0 68(SP) ; Player Index
LBU A1 0(S0) ; Assigns Chain Index to A1
JAL SetPlayerOntoChain
LBU A2 1(S0) ; Assigns Space Index to A2

LBU A0 68(SP) ; Player Index
LBU A1 2(S0) ; Assigns Chain Index to A1
JAL SetNextChainAndSpace
LBU A2 3(S0) ; Assigns Space Index to A2

LBU A0 68(SP) ; Player Index
LBU A1 4(S0) ; Assigns Chain Index to A1
JAL SetPrevChainAndSpace
LBU A2 5(S0) ; Assigns Space Index to A2

LBU A0 0(S0) ; Assigns Chain Index to A1
JAL GetAbsSpaceIndexFromChainSpaceIndex ; Gets True Space Index at V0
LBU A1 1(S0) ; Assigns Space Index to A2

JAL GetSpaceData ; Pointer to Space Data at V0
MOVE A0 V0 ; True Space Index

LW V1 8(V0) 
SW V1 64(SP) ; Store on the Stack

LW V1 16(V0)
SW V1 60(SP) ; Store on the Stack

JAL GetPlayerStruct ; Player Struct at V0
LBU A0 68(SP)  ; Player Index

LW V1 0x24(V0) ; Load Offset 0x24 into V1
ADDIU V1 V1 0xC ; Add 0xC to get current player's X Coords
LW T0 64(SP) ; Load Space X Coords from Stack
SW T0 0(V1) 

ADDIU V1 V1 8 ; This should load current player's Y Coords
LW T1 60(SP) ; Load Space Y Coords from Stack
SW T1 0(V1)

LW S0 72(SP) ; Array Pointer
LW RA 76(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 80

.align 16
GetSumOfPlayerItems:
ADDIU SP SP -80
SW RA 76(SP)
SW S0 72(SP)
SW S1 68(SP)

LI S0 3 ; Start with Player 4
LI S1 0 ; Item Counter
GetSumOfPlayerItems_loop:
BLTZ S0 GetSumOfPlayerItems_exit
NOP

JAL PlayerHasEmptyItemSlot ; Empty Item Slot Index at V0 (0, 1, 2, -1)
MOVE A0 S0 ; Player Index

LI T0 -1 ; No Inventory Index
BLTZL V0 GetSumOfPlayerItems_add
LI V0 3 ; If no space, make it 3 items

GetSumOfPlayerItems_add:
ADDU S1 S1 V0 ; Add to the Item Counter
J GetSumOfPlayerItems_loop
ADDIU S0 S0 -1 ; Subtract 1 to get next player


GetSumOfPlayerItems_exit:
MOVE V0 S1 ; Move Item Counter to proper register
LW S1 68(SP)
LW S0 72(SP)
LW RA 76(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 80
